original_title: Pastor Jerome’s petition fixed for support
original_body_lines: The Supreme Court has decided to support on July 28, the Fundamental Rights petition filed by Pastor Jerome Fernando requesting the court to issue an order preventing his arrest by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID), Ada Derana reporter said.
Meanwhile, the court has also granted permission for the request filed by Ven. Elle Gunawansa Thero and several others to intervene in the petition and present facts.
